name: Click'n Wash
description: Click'n Wash is clicker games for advertising local busines in Yogyakarta, your objective is to collect money until reaching the intended score by utilizing the tools and upgrades. Therefore, we from the game developer team Ice Tea Studio aim to create a casual game with the theme of car washing to help promote business advertising from our client RWash. With this joint project, it is certainly hoped that it can provide positive results from various parties, namely new experiences for the game developer team, digital promotions for producers, and entertainment for consumers.
